Item.Text: Can you get the driver for me?

Item.Text: Please don't stand till the bus stops?

Item.Text: Please do not use your cell phone while driving.

Item.Title: Please do not smoke and come into the bus, I have health issues.
Item.Text: Please do not smoke and come into the bus, I have health issues.

Item.Title: I am afraid of dogs. Can you please tell the owner?
Item.Text: I am afraid of dogs. Can you please tell the owner?
